info.name: YouTube Theme 3.5
info.description: VIDEO:COMMENT:HOME:
info.additionalInfo:
This theme has been improved from the previous YouTube Theme 2.0.
I have added:
-Bug fixes
-New colors
-New background/images
-Border colors
-Border radius/round-corners
-Hover effects
-Transform effects(rotate,scale,etc...)
-Transition effects
-Transparency/opacity
-The comment box appearance(still a bit buggy)
-New YouTube Logo
-Customized buttons layout

v3.5 update:

-new font style
-adjusted font color and font size
-added changing backgrounds

data.title: i want the old font back
